this christmas is going to be a good holiday .
output.sentences: Michael loved everything about the holidays but he always wanted to start with icing cookies.
We usually get the gift opening out of the way first thing, so as to have time to focus on family.
Many treats were had, many treats were swiped.
To finish off the night, Michael brought out the gifts he made for his family.
